blogArticles.title: Dev tricks, Part 1: The Importance of Code Formatting with Prettier
blogArticles.description: Are you tired of staring at messy, unformatted code that looks like it was written by a herd of chaotic monkeys? Fear not, because Prettier is here to save the day! In this hilarious and informative article, you'll learn all about the importance of code formatting and how Prettier can help you take your code from a hot mess to a work of art. Trust us, your code (and your sanity) will thank you.

blogArticles.title: Setting Up Your Own CI/CD Server with Drone CI
blogArticles.description: Streamline your software development process with Drone CI. Learn how to set up your own CI/CD server using Drone CI and take advantage of its open-source flexibility, ease of use, and scalability. Read now and find out why Drone CI is the right choice for your organization.

blogArticles.description: Designing system architecture can be challenging for new developers. ChatGPT's language model can simplify the process, highlighting pros and cons of your approach, suggesting alternatives and generating sequence diagrams using PlantUML. Make software development a breeze!
